alert.note: Alert for Marion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 8:46PM EDT until May 13 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Marion County in central Indiana... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 846 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Plainfield, or 8 miles southwest of Indianapolis, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Monument Circle around 905 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Southport and Homecroft. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 107 and 111. Interstate 70 between mile markers 69 and 80. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
